CREATE TABLE trip (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, description TEXT NOT NULL, trip_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE trip_location (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, id_trip INTEGER NOT NULL, location_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, latitude REAL NOT NULL, longitude REAL NOT NULL, altitude REAL, speed REAL, FOREIGN KEY(id_trip) REFERENCES trip(id));
DROP TABLE trip_location; DROP TABLE trip;
SELECT * FROM trip WHERE date(trip_date / 1000, \'unixepoch\', \'localtime\') = date (\'now\')
SELECT * FROM trip ORDER BY trip_date DESC
